funding-group.funding-statement: This study was funded by the MOE Tier 2 grants (MOE 2017-T2-1-078 and MOE 2017- T2-2-014) and Singapore National Research Foundation grant (NRF2016NRF- NSFC002-012) awarded to JJHC, as well as Institutional research funding (IUT20-27) from Estonian Research Council and funding from The Wellcome Trust (200171/Z/15/Z), both awarded to AM. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
